Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Kitchen Maintenance Scraper with Supabase integration

Features:
- Auto-process all maintenance jobs from portal
- Sync data to Supabase database
- Extract job details and maintenance items
- Track delivery status
- Popup summaries for each job
- Integration with web app for email generation

Files:
- kitchen-portal-to-supabase.user.js (v4.1) - Main Supabase sync script
- kitchen-portal-scraper-complete.user.js (v3.0) - Standalone version
- kitchen-portal-scraper.user.js (v2.0) - Legacy version
- Dashboard and job manager HTML files
- Documentation guides
